openmm_reporter¶

class deepdrivemd.sim.openmm_stream.openmm_reporter.ContactMapReporter(reportInterval, cfg)¶

Periodically reports the results of the openmm simulation

__init__(reportInterval, cfg)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

report(simulation, state)¶

Computes contact maps, md5 sum of positions, rmsd to the reference state and records them into _adios_stream

write_adios_step(output: Dict[str, numpy.ndarray])¶

Write a step into _adios_stream

Parameters

output (Dict[str, np.ndarray]) – key - adios column name to which to write a value of the dictionary representing one step
